list.name: getTradingRecordIdsByUserIdOrderByTradingTime
list.sqlitem: select id from trading_record where user_id = ? order by trading_time desc

map.name: getTradingRecordIdsByTradingNum
map.sqlitem: select id from trading_record where trading_num = ?

list.name: getTradingRecordIdsAll
list.sqlitem: select id from trading_record where 1 = 1 order by create_at desc
